FileFormat.FormatDescription: Aon files produced by ArtOfNoise music tracker software, freeware which was available on the Commodore Amiga. It was intended to be a soundtracker suited to synthetic songs, with a wider range of instruments and effects than comparable software. Originally made in 4 channel mode, a later 8 channel version was produced.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: AON8
